title: Reposition camera if only one term
message_prompt: If there's only one item in SelectedCorpus, add z += 5 to the targetCoordinates
message_edit:
I will modify the Camera component in the `frontend/src/Camera.js` file to adjust the target coordinates when there is only one item in `selectedCorpus`.

Steps:
1. Check the length of `selectedCorpus` inside the `useEffect` that computes the bounding box.
2. If there's only one item, add 5 to the z-coordinate of the target.
